control_attributes.control_description: The organization: (a) Conducts an organizational assessment of risk prior to the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services; and(b) Ensures that the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services is approved by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to enable integrity verification of software and firmware components.

Control Statement: The organization: (a) Conducts an organizational assessment of risk prior to the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services; and(b) Ensures that the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services is approved by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
